states.msg:
Thank you for calling the BLING HOTLINE. 

 The appearance of safety is important. To ensure the emotional safety of our customers, we must review any symptoms you may be experiencing.

 If you are experiencing an INSATIABLE URGE TO DANCE, press 1.

If you’re not sure if you are dreaming, press 2.

If you are disillusioned with our dystopian timeline and would like to choose another, press 3.

If you’re being chased by an army of health goth pigeons Press 4.

If you are trying to log in to america online press 5.

If you forgot all the options and do not want to listen to this menu again, press 7.

You are at the main menu.
Press 0 to return to the main menu. To hang up, hang up.
